Package game.actions.standardactions

package game.actions.standardactions
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AttackAction
    An Action to attack another Actor.
    ConsumeAction
    An action that consumes one of the actors' consumable items.
    DeathAction
    An action executed if an actor is killed.
    DespawnAction
    An Action to despawn another Actor.
    GiveRunesAction
    An action that gives runes to the player when runes are dropped.
    PurchaseAction
    An Action to purchase an item from a Trader.
    PurchaseWithItemAction
    An Action to purchase an item from a Trader using an item.
    RecoverRunesAction
    An action that allows the player to pick up a RunePile, recovering their lost runes from their most recent death.
    ResetAction
    An action that allows the player to pick up a RunePile, recovering their lost runes from their most recent death.
    RestAction
    An action that allows the player to rest, resetting the game.
    SellingItemAction
    An Action to sell an item to a Trader.
    SellingWeaponAction
    An Action to sell an item to a Trader.
    SummonAction
    An action that allows the player to summon an NPC.
    TravelAction
    An Action to send an actor to another location or map.
